pr_title: shorten jar names (prefixes of runtime classnames)

timeline.bodyText: classdata is the part I thought you wanted to rename as ddcls...
timeline.author: tylerbenson

replies.bodyText: Though upon further thought, that might break some optimizations you did by preventing the use of "substring" which is probably more efficient than replace.
replies.author: tylerbenson

replies.bodyText: yes that's why I didn't do it
replies.author: richardstartin

timeline.bodyText:
I wonder if this rename is even necessary...
If so, here I'm fine with just .dd.
timeline.author: tylerbenson
